faq.pageDescription: Everything you need to know about using our AI-powered article idea generator
faq.q1: What is an article idea generator?
faq.a1: An article idea generator is an AI-powered tool that creates compelling article titles and headlines based on your topic or keywords. It helps writers, bloggers, and content creators overcome writer's block and find engaging angles for their content.
faq.q2: Is the article title generator really free?
faq.a2: Yes! Our article idea generator is completely free to use with no signup required. You can generate unlimited article titles without any restrictions or hidden fees.
faq.q3: What's the difference between SEO mode and regular mode?
faq.a3: SEO mode generates titles optimized for search engines with attention-grabbing elements and relevant keywords. Regular mode creates professional, straightforward titles without clickbait elements. Choose based on your content goals.
faq.q4: Can I generate abstracts for my article titles?
faq.a4: Yes! Click the document icon next to any generated title to create a professional abstract. This helps you plan your article structure and key points before writing.
faq.q5: What AI model powers the article generator?
faq.a5: We use GPT-4o-mini, OpenAI's latest and most efficient model, to generate high-quality, creative article titles and abstracts in seconds.
faq.q6: How many article titles can I generate?
faq.a6: You can generate unlimited article titles! There are no daily limits, no signup requirements, and no hidden restrictions. Use it as much as you need.
faq.q7: Can I use the generated titles for commercial purposes?
faq.a7: Yes! All generated titles are yours to use freely for any purpose - personal blogs, commercial websites, client work, or any other content creation needs.
faq.q8: Why should I use an article title generator?
faq.a8: An article title generator helps you overcome writer's block, saves time brainstorming, provides SEO-optimized titles, offers fresh perspectives on topics, and helps you create more engaging content that attracts readers.
faq.ctaTitle: Try Our Free Article Title Generator
faq.ctaDescription: Generate SEO-optimized article ideas in seconds with AI

tools.bottomCtaDescription: Use our AI-powered generator to create engaging article titles in seconds.

wordCounter.name: Word Counter
wordCounter.description: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs. Get reading time estimates for your content.
wordCounter.pageTitle: Word Counter - Free Online Word Count Tool
wordCounter.pageDescription: Free online word counter tool. Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs instantly. Get reading time estimates for your content.
wordCounter.title: Word Counter
wordCounter.subtitle: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in real-time. Get reading and speaking time estimates for your content.
wordCounter.placeholder: Paste or type your text here to count words...
wordCounter.aboutDescription: Our free word counter is the fastest way to count words online. Whether you're writing a blog post, essay, article, or social media content, this tool helps you track your word count, character count, and more in real-time.
wordCounter.feature1: Instant word and character counting as you type
wordCounter.feature3: Reading time estimate (based on 200 words per minute)
wordCounter.feature4: Speaking time estimate (based on 150 words per minute)
wordCounter.feature5: Top keyword analysis to identify frequently used words
wordCounter.useCase1: Writers tracking essay or article length requirements
wordCounter.useCase2: Students meeting word count limits for assignments
wordCounter.useCase3: Bloggers optimizing content length for SEO
wordCounter.useCase4: Content creators preparing scripts for videos or podcasts

characterCounter.name: Character Counter
characterCounter.description: Track character counts with social media limits for Twitter, LinkedIn, meta descriptions, and more.

readingTime.name: Reading Time Calculator
readingTime.description: Calculate reading and speaking time for your content. Get 'X min read' badges for your blog.

headlineAnalyzer.name: Headline Analyzer
headlineAnalyzer.description: Analyze your headlines for SEO, emotional impact, and click-through potential. Get actionable suggestions.

qrCode.name: QR Code Generator
qrCode.description: Create custom QR codes for URLs, text, WiFi, vCard, email, phone, SMS, location, and events. Download as PNG, SVG, or JPG.
qrCode.pageTitle: QR Code Generator - Free Online QR Code Maker
qrCode.pageDescription: Free online QR code generator. Create custom QR codes for URLs, text, WiFi networks, vCard contacts, email, phone, SMS, location, and calendar events. Customize colors and download in multiple formats.
qrCode.title: QR Code Generator
qrCode.subtitle: Create professional QR codes for any purpose. Support for 9 different types including URLs, WiFi, vCard contacts, and calendar events with full customization options.
qrCode.locationHint: Enter a place name or coordinates
qrCode.previewPlaceholder: Enter content and click Generate to create your QR code
qrCode.aboutDescription: Our free QR code generator creates high-quality QR codes instantly. Generate codes for URLs, WiFi networks, contact cards, calendar events, and more. All processing happens in your browser - your data never leaves your device.
qrCode.featureCustomDesc: Choose from 8 color presets or create your own custom colors. Adjust size and error correction for any use case.
qrCode.featureTypesDesc: URL, Text, WiFi, vCard, Email, Phone, SMS, Location, and Calendar Events - all supported.
qrCode.featureDownloadDesc: Download as PNG for web, SVG for print, or JPG for smaller files. Copy to clipboard with one click.
qrCode.featurePrivacyDesc: All QR codes are generated locally in your browser. Your data never touches our servers.
qrCode.featureUnlimitedDesc: Generate as many QR codes as you need. No signup, no limits, no watermarks.
qrCode.featureInstantDesc: QR codes are generated instantly as you type. Preview your code before downloading.
qrCode.useCase1Desc: Add a vCard QR code to your business cards for instant contact sharing.
qrCode.useCase2Desc: Create WiFi QR codes for easy guest network access.
qrCode.useCase3Desc: Link to product pages, manuals, or registration forms.
qrCode.useCase4Desc: Create calendar event QR codes for easy RSVP and scheduling.
